resources.string: Start your command with nc or ncat. See examples.
This application is a wrapper around the ncat binary cross-compiled for Android from the Nmap source (https://nmap.org). This is not an official Nmap application.

EXAMPLES:
ncat 192.168.1.100 9999
ncat -lp 9999
ncat -u 192.168.1.100 9999
ncat -ulp 9999
ncat -lp 9999 -e /system/bin/sh

Type 'ncat --help' for the full list.
Please report an issue if you find any bug while trying different flags.
Source code: https://github.com/ruvolof/nc-for-android. Use Github to submit bugs or feature requests.
